column1: Dodinas Brandybuck was a Hobbits of the Shire.
Dodinas was the fourth child of Gorbadoc Brandybuck and Mirabella Took
column2: born between  and . He seems to have died before  as he was not present at Bilbo Baggins Bilbos Farewell Party.
Dodinas is a Celtic name of unknown meaning. The name was also borne by Sir Dodinas le Savage
column3: a Knight of the Round Table.
